data.text:
@yasserogier @stefanbar @gillianoberholzer

I was only told about two fields having undefined values.

Case Reference Number
Birth Certificate Number

Now suddenly Last Name on defendants was also affected? Would have been nice to know this before making some decisions.

The following fields are considered important

Case Reference Number
Last Name (Dependent)

The Birth Certificate Number is not important and all undefined values on this specific field can be removed.

Please check once more and let me know if there are any more fields that have undefined as values?
